node.title: Over One-Quarter of Texas Parents Say They Won't Vaccinate Their Child Against COVID: Poll

node.title: The Macy’s parade brings customers back for turkey hats and coffee.

node.title: Man Receives Hundreds of Responses After Inviting Complete Strangers to Thanksgiving Meal

node.title: National Party board did not endorse Bridges' demotion - president

node.title: At least 27 die in worst migrant disaster to date in English Channel

node.title: Noah Gordon, 95, Dies; American Novelist With an Audience Overseas
